alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:57AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN SWITZERLAND, CARROLL, GRANT, OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 445 AM EDT... At 357 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Owenton, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Williamstown, Dry Ridge, Vevay, Warsaw, Owenton, Kentucky Speedway, Glencoe, Ghent, Sanders, Corinth, Sparta, Worthville, Prestonville, Monterey, Gratz, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Ryle and Wheatley. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 39 and 69. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 144 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
